text:
Hello Pheya!
How are you doing

Hello Shailendra! 
Im doing very good actually. Thanks for your tips thats very helpful! 

I took part in an Access VFX event for the second year in a row last week, where a few of us students organised some activities for colleges in the region. Raising awareness of the industry alongside some industry guests! The day was great and everyone enjoyed it! 

I spoke to one of the business managers of Lexhag and told her about my comp and production experience and now im currently working on a project!! As a production trainee! Coordinating and ensuring smooth running of the projects! 

I am really enjoying it, pretty cool that it is my first industry paid job.

Hey Pheya!
Thats great news.
In my experience a lot of learning happens on the job.
Congratulations on your progress.
